analysis.description:
BancorNetwork.convertForMultiple (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#503-540) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- IEtherToken(fromToken).deposit.value(_amounts[i])() (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#534-535)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#65-66)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = IBancorConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#626-630)

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#637-638)

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf20b9e713a33f61fa38792d2afaf1cd30339126a.sol#637-638)
